title: Advanced Language Education Design Course Utilizing Learning Analytics

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational instructional design knowledge and language education experience
context.additional_context: A program for pre-service and in-service teachers emphasizing the development of customized language education design skills using learning analytics tools

learning_goals: Learners can derive at least three key factors for language learning design by interpreting learning analytics data.
Learners can collect and visualize learner performance data using learning analytics tools in simulation/VR environments.
Learners can create at least two improvement proposals for learning design based on formative assessment results.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
